name: Freerunner
description:
Run, jump, and slide your way through cyberpunk  rooftops and buildings. Make your great escape! Currently one playable level.

Controls:

  1. A + D or Left + Right Arrow - movement
  2. S - slide (you need some momentum first to slide!)
  3. SPACE - jump

* Freerunner is still in an early state, input is appreciated! Made in Unity.
